name: 圣维丹物语
description: As an adventurer, you have received a guild mission to find the designated mysterious person in Saint Vedan Town, and a remote secret is being revealed due to your arrival. Danger comes to you, but as an adventurer, you are full of blood. Through the study of business skills and the accumulation of combat experience, you will gradually expand the ranch and enhance the reputation of adventurers, and your destiny will be changed.
